text: Hey Mitch,
Last box!  Dad, everyone's going through Grandpa's stuff...
It's alright, you know he was a very generous guy. Yeah, but I'm worried about his reputation...
Reputation? What are you talking about?
I need to show you something.  Alright. I found this when I was going through one of Granpa's boxes..
(laughter) Your grandfather was a very passionate guy!
God rest his soul...wherever he is...
Wherever he is...
I had looked far and wide, under rocks and bridges
the unforgettable past clipping at my heels...
Time was no longer a friend, but a pacesetter
Urging me forward, forever forward...
Tt was a fool's game and I knew it, but I couldn't give it up.
Friends, family and possessions melted away with each passing year
as the Phantoms of memory hid like pimps around the next corner
and I searched, always I searched
but I never did find him
I never did find the perfect slice of New York Pizza
but I did find the perfect spot to enjoy a sunset. That was the last time I ever
thought about Pizza...Pizza just didn't make sense any more.
piece just didn't make sense anymore I mean in my mind Mexican was always the obvious choice,
but I was gonna say that out loud.
I don't really care if somebody just said.. Would you just shut up? What?
Stop talking. Why?
I just I just wanna sit here.
I just wanna fucking sit here and
enjoy
being next to each other.
